message: I think we can both do better.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor this round, and we can negotiate further if you don't agree.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think a 65/35 split is fair considering the inflation we're facing.  Let's make a deal before we both lose more money.
We're getting close to the end, and I'm willing to take a bit less this time. Let's make a deal at 70/30. It's the best chance we have of getting anything at all.
Last chance for a fair deal!
We're running out of time, Alice.  This is my final offer.  It's 75/25, or we both walk away with nothing.
